qa.question: how can i register on legalconnect
qa.answer: Click on 'Sign Up' from the homepage and select whether you're a client or a lawyer. Fill in the required details and submit the form.

qa.question: how do i login
qa.answer: Go to the homepage, click 'Login', and enter your registered email and password to access your account.

qa.question: how do i logout
qa.answer: Click on your profile icon at the top-right corner and select 'Logout' from the dropdown menu.

qa.question: how can i connect with a lawyer
qa.answer: Browse the 'Find Lawyers' section, view lawyer profiles, and click 'Connect' to send a case request.

qa.question: what happens after i send a request to a lawyer
qa.answer: Once your request is sent, the lawyer will review it and either accept or reject your case. You will be notified of their decision.

qa.question: can i contact a lawyer directly
qa.answer: After a lawyer accepts your case, youâ€™ll be able to contact them via the in-app messaging or contact options.

qa.question: can i cancel my case request
qa.answer: Yes, go to 'My Requests' and click 'Cancel' next to the request you want to withdraw.

qa.question: how can i submit a case request
qa.answer: Go to the 'Case Request' section, fill in the form with case details, attach supporting documents if required, and submit.

qa.question: how do i know if my case is accepted
qa.answer: Youâ€™ll receive a notification and see the status as 'Accepted' in your dashboard when the lawyer approves your case.

qa.question: what if my case request is rejected
qa.answer: If a lawyer rejects your request, youâ€™ll receive a notification. You can try connecting with another lawyer.

qa.question: can i track my case progress
qa.answer: Yes, under 'My Cases', you can view the status updates and lawyer communications related to your ongoing cases.

qa.question: what is the legal dictionary
qa.answer: The legal dictionary provides definitions and explanations of legal terms, helping you understand case-related terminology.

qa.question: how can i use the legal dictionary
qa.answer: Go to the 'Legal Dictionary' tab, search for any legal term, and view its meaning and related concepts.

qa.question: how do i update my profile
qa.answer: Log in to your account, click 'Profile', edit your details, and click 'Save Changes' to update your profile information.

qa.question: can i change my role after registration
qa.answer: No, roles (client or lawyer) are fixed at registration. To switch, please create a new account with the correct role.

qa.question: do i need to pay to connect with a lawyer
qa.answer: Some lawyers may charge consultation fees. The fee details, if applicable, will be shown on the lawyerâ€™s profile before sending a request.

qa.question: how are lawyer fees handled
qa.answer: Fees are discussed directly between the client and lawyer once a case request is accepted.

qa.question: how do i report a technical issue
qa.answer: Go to 'Support' or 'Help' section on the website and describe the issue. Our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

qa.question: i am unable to submit a case request form
qa.answer: Please ensure all required fields are filled and your internet connection is stable. If the issue persists, contact support.

qa.question: is my data safe on legalconnect
qa.answer: Yes, LegalConnect uses advanced encryption and secure data storage to ensure your information remains confidential.

qa.question: can other users view my case details
qa.answer: No, only you and the lawyer handling your case can access the case details.
